title: 27: God, Church, & The Broads
itunes:title: 27: God, Church, & The Broads
description:
The Broads talk religion, Christian upbringing, their current views, sexuality and the church, youth group, Relient K, Rob Bell, and much more. They are also joined by amazing guest Valerie Franco who discusses her journey as a queer woman in the church.
